mapper.select: select p.pid, pname, pnote, b.bno, pstatus, pc.pcid, pcimg1, pcimg2, pcimg3, pcchipimg, pcprice, pccolorcode, pcprice, b.bname from likes l inner join product_common p on (l.pid = p.pid) inner join brand b on (p.bno = b.bno) inner join product_color pc on (pc.pid = p.pid) where l.mid =#{mId}

select pc.pcId, pcImg1, pcImg2, pcImg3, pcChipImg, pcColorCode, pcPrice, psId, psStock, pSize from product_color pc inner join product_stock ps on(pc.pcid = ps.pcid) where pc.pid = #{pId} and pc.pcid = #{pcId}
